alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Palo Pinto; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 3:26AM CDT until March 24 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Eastland County in north central Texas... Southern Stephens County in north central Texas... Southwestern Palo Pinto County in north central Texas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 325 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Moran, or 13 miles northwest of Cisco, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastland, Cisco, Ranger, Gordon, Lake Cisco, Necessity, Caddo, Lake Daniel, Gunsight, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Strawn, Mingus, Eolian, Harpersville and Morton Valley. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 324 and 332, and between mile markers 353 and 362. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
